solution_line_template: The total amount of money that Florence received is {florence_multiplier}*{rene_money} = $<<{florence_multiplier}*{rene_money}={florence_money}>>{florence_money}, three times as much money as Rene received.
Maria gave Isha half the amount of money that Florence received, which is ${florence_money}/{half_divisor} = $<<{florence_money}/{half_divisor}={isha_money}>>{isha_money}
